querent.name: Lazarus Aura
querent.description: If you were to die this turn, regenerate to full health instead

querent.name: Blessed Aura
querent.description: At the start of your turn heal for 10% of your total health. 5 turns to recharge

querent.name: Immaculate Aura
querent.description: Immune to one negative effect, curse or charm. 5 Turns to recharge

querent.name: Forsaken Aura
querent.description: Immune to one negative effect, curse or charm. 5 Turns to recharge

querent.name: Amnesia Aura
querent.description: 20% fail chance when using any items or abilities

querent.name: Downed Phoenix Aura
querent.description: You don't lose any items upon death. You get back to life with 75% health

querent.name: Joy Aura
querent.description: At the start of your turn heal for 5% of your total health. Lasts 3 turns

querent.name: Cleansed Aura
querent.description: Immune to one negative effect, curse or charm.

querent.name: Hatred Aura
querent.description: At the start of your Querent's Phase, lose 2 Health for every effect, curse, blessing or charm on you.

querent.name: Silence Aura
querent.description: 50% fail chance when using any items or abilities

querent.name: Connection Aura
querent.description: 20% of health lost this turn is shared with every player equally for 10 turns

querent.name: Saved Aura
querent.description: 5% of health lost this turn is shared with player who doesn't have a Saved Aura.

querent.name: Cain Aura
querent.description: 10% of health lost this turn is shared with player who gave you this aura

querent.name: Duality Aura
querent.description: 20% of every health lost is shared with one other random player for 10 turns

querent.name: Good and Evil
querent.description: You can see all opponents position on the map and see what they are seeing. 5 turns to recharge

querent.name: Snake Eyes Aura
querent.description: See what the player without Snake Eyes Aura sees for 3 turns

querent.name: Snake Tongue Aura
querent.description: See what the player who gave you this aura sees for 3 turns

querent.name: Kings Chariot
querent.description: Your first movement action is free

querent.name: Hermes Stampede
querent.description: As a first action, move 4 tiles in one direction. You can't perform any additional actions.

querent.name: Hermes Charge
querent.description: As a first action, move 4 tiles in one direction. You can't perform any additional actions.

querent.name: Lucky Ball and Chains
querent.description: Movement action costs 2 action. Lasts for 2 turns then replace this action with Move action

querent.name: Forever Lost
querent.description: 20% chance you move to an incorrect tile

item.name: Good and Evil
item.description: You can see what all opponents on the map can see

item.name: Flying Carpet
item.description: Move normally through blocked tiles this turn

item.name: Magic Bottle
item.description: Move normally through blocked tiles this turn

item.name: Honey Trap
item.description: Summons a Bear to fight against who stepped on this trap

item.name: Meat Trap
item.description: Summons a Wolf to fight against who stepped on this trap

item.name: Explosion Trap
item.description: Explodes dealing 10% - 30% of your health as damage. Damages over time for 3% of your health for 3 turns

item.name: Explosion Trap
item.description: Damages over time for 7% of your health for 3 turns

item.name: Eagle Trap
item.description: Summons an Eagle that follows target, whoever sets the trap sees what target sees for 3 turns

item.name: Eagle Trap
item.description: Reveals target location to who set the trap for 3 turns

summon.name: Healing Fountain
summon.description: Heals for 20% each action and removes all negative effects, curses or charms. Last 10 turns. Only one use per player.

summon.name: Eternal Fountain of Youth
summon.description: Heals for 20 each action and removes all negative effects, curses or charms. One charge. Regenerates one charge every 2 turns

card.name: The High Price
card.description: Separate target opponent's card. At any moment of the game, target opponent may choose to discard two cards to buy that card. You may buy that card by discarding one card.

card.name: The Con Artist
card.description: Choose a new target for target opponent's spell then steal it from target opponent. Draw a card.

card.name: A Fool and His Money
card.description: When target opponent uses any Flip card, look at target opponent hand. Equally trade any number of cards from your hand with Target Opponent's.

card.name: The Precipice's Edge
card.description: Separate target opponent's card. At any moment of the game, target opponent may choose to discard two cards to buy that card.

card.name: The Con Man
card.description: Choose a new target for target opponent's spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Fool's Gold
card.description: Equally trade any number of cards from your hand with Target Opponent's. Target Opponent decides which cards to trade.

card.name: Mother's Requiem
card.description: If you were targeted by silence this turn, look at the top three cards of the Player's Deck. Buy two and shuffle the other one

card.name: Gentle Whisper
card.description: If you were targeted by silence this turn, look at the top three cards of the Player's Deck. Buy one and shuffle the other two

card.name: The Philantropist
card.description: Use this card immediately. Instead of discarding cards, you now move them to a different pile. Players may choose to buy from that pile instead of the Player's Deck

card.name: Wasteless Empire
card.description: You can't play any other spells this turn. Buy up to two cards from the discard pile.

card.name: Frugal Living
card.description: You can't play any other spells this turn. Buy one card from the discard pile. If there are no cards at the discard pile, buy it from the Player's Deck instead

card.name: The Gemini
card.description: You can't play any other spells during this turn. Buy two cards.

card.name: The Mother Nature
card.description: You can't play any other spells during this turn. Buy one card. Place two markers on this card. Remove one marker from this card at the start of your turn. If there are no markers on this card, return it to your hand (Blessing: Instead of discarding this card, separate it)

card.name: Empirical Endowment
card.description: Redirect target opponent "buy a card" effect to you, then look at target opponent hand and steal a card from it.

card.name: To the Emperor
card.description: Redirect target opponent "buy a card" effect to you.

card.name: Firstborn's Demise
card.description: ENCHANTER TOKEN: Look at each opponent's hand. Steal one card from one of them - NO ENCHANTER TOKEN: Show your hand to all your opponents. Enchanter steals a card from you - AFTER: Enchanter discards enchanter token. Remove The Emperor's Ear from the fate deck. Draw a new fate.

card.name: The Emperor Ears
card.description: ENCHANTER TOKEN: Look at each opponent's hand - NO ENCHANTER TOKEN: Show your hand to all your opponents - AFTER: Enchanter discards enchanter token. Remove The Emperor's Ear from the fate deck. Draw a new fate.

card.name: Tax Returns
card.description: ENCHANTER TOKEN: Each opponent may choose to discard two cards. Buy a card for each opponent who doesn't discard two cards - NO ENCHANTER TOKEN: Discard a card. Enchanter buys a card - AFTER: Enchanter discards enchanter token. Remove Tax Returns from the fate deck. Draw a new fate.

card.name: A Minor Tribute
card.description: ENCHANTER TOKEN: Each opponent discards a card - NO ENCHANTER TOKEN: Discard a card - AFTER: Enchanter discards enchanter token. Remove A Minor Tribute from the fate deck. Draw a new fate.
